member.name: T:Tizen.Multimedia.Camera
member.summary: This camera class provides methods to capture photos and supports setting up notifications for state changes of capturing, previewing, focusing, and informing about the resolution and the binary format, and functions for picture manipulations like sepia, negative, and many more. It also notifies you when a significant picture parameter changes, (For example, focus).

This camera class provides methods to capture photos and supports setting up notifications for state changes of capturing, previewing, focusing, and informing about the resolution and the binary format, and functions for picture manipulations like sepia, negative, and many more. It also notifies you when a significant picture parameter changes, (For example, focus).

This camera class provides methods to capture photos and supports setting up notifications for state changes of capturing, previewing, focusing, and informing about the resolution and the binary format, and functions for picture manipulations like sepia, negative, and many more. It also notifies you when a significant picture parameter changes, (For example, focus).

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Camera.StartCapture
member.summary: Starts capturing of still images. EventHandler must be set for capturing using and for completed using before calling this method. The camera must be in the state.
member.remarks: This function causes the transition of the camera state from capturing to captured automatically and the corresponding EventHandlers will be invoked. The preview should be restarted by calling the method after capture is completed.
member.exception: In case of any invalid operations.
In case of this feature is not supported.
The camera already has been disposed of.
In case of access to the resources cannot be granted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Camera.StartCapture(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts continuously capturing still images. EventHandler must be set for capturing using and for completed using before calling this method. The camera must be in the state.
member.param: The cancellation token to cancel capturing.
member.remarks: If this is not supported, zero shutter lag occurs. The capture resolution could be changed to the preview resolution. This function causes the transition of the camera state from capturing to captured automatically and the corresponding Eventhandlers will be invoked. Each captured image will be delivered through Eventhandler set using the event. The preview should be restarted by calling the method after capture is completed.
member.exception: In case of invalid parameters.
In case of any invalid operations.
In case of this feature is not supported.
The camera already has been disposed of.
In case of access to the resources cannot be granted.

member.summary: Clone the mode - the preview image is displayed on an external display with full screen mode. Also, the preview image is shown by the UI on the device display.

member.name: F:Tizen.Multimedia.CameraTheaterMode.Enable
member.summary: Enable the theater mode - the preview image is displayed on an external display with full screen mode, but the preview image is not shown on the device display.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.CameraSettings.HdrMode
member.summary: The mode of the HDR(High dynamic range) capture.
member.value: A that specifies the HDR mode.
member.remarks: Taking multiple pictures at different exposure levels and intelligently stitching them together, so that we eventually arrive at a picture that is representative in both dark and bright areas. If this attribute is set, then event handler set for the HdrCaptureProgress event is invoked.
member.exception: The camera already has been disposed of.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.CameraSettings.AntiShake
member.summary: The anti shake feature. If true, the antishake feature is enabled, otherwise false.
member.exception: The camera already has been disposed of.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.CameraSettings.VideoStabilization
member.summary: Enables or disables the video stabilization feature. If true, video stabilization is enabled, otherwise false.
member.remarks: If video stabilization is enabled, zero shutter lag is disabled. This feature is used to record a video.
member.exception: The camera already has been disposed of.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.CameraSettings.DisableShutterSound(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turn the shutter sound on or off, if it is permitted by policy.
member.remarks: If this value is true, shutter sound will be disabled, otherwise enabled. In some countries, this operation is not permitted.
member.exception: Disabling shutter sound is not permitted.
The camera already has been disposed of.
